name: Air Fryer Crispy & Crunchy Chicken Strips
description: Who doesn’t love extra crunchy chicken strips? The secret: using an air fryer to help crisp them up on all sides. Serve with Honey Mustard for the ultimate fast-food meal, made at healthier, at home.
preparation: Meanwhile, in a bowl, add chicken and mayo; toss to coat.
Place coating mix in a shallow dish. Using tongs or your hands, add chicken one piece at a time, rotating and pressing mix on both sides of chicken to coat.
In two batches, place chicken in single layer in basket, leaving some space between each piece.
Cook 8–10 min, flipping halfway through using tongs, or until golden and cooked through.
tips: For an extra crispy coating, spray coated chicken with oil before cooking.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 2 cups leafy greens with 1 tbsp prepared Epicure Salad Dressing, your choice, and 1⁄2 cup cooked grains.

products.name: Crispy & Crunchy Coating (Pkg of 3)
summary: Craving the crunch? Add a crispy gluten free coating – that’s never soggy or bland – to protein and veggies and bake them in the oven. You’ll get all the taste of your fave fried foods without a trace of greasiness, so you can enjoy them whenever the craving strikes!
